Author: Jaxxa9948
Description:
Reduces the size of Trade Cogs and Carts to prevent them from bumping into each other on congested routes.
Increases the capacity of Tree to 350 Wood.
Increases each Stone Mine to 30,000 Stone.
Increases each Gold mine to 10,000 Gold.
Increased the extra food for farms provided by Horse Collar to 10,000.
Increased Feitoria cost and resource generation.
Title: Jaxxa's Enhanced Resources and Trade
